trans-unit.source: about_Functions_Advanced
trans-unit.target: about_Functions_Advanced

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Functions Advanced
trans-unit.target: 有关高级函数

trans-unit.source: about_Functions_Advanced
trans-unit.target: about_Functions_Advanced

trans-unit.source: TOPIC
trans-unit.target: TOPIC

trans-unit.source: about_Functions_Advanced
trans-unit.target: about_Functions_Advanced

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Introduces advanced functions that act similar to cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 引入了作用类似于 cmdlet 的高级的功能。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: Advanced functions allow you to write functions that can perform operations that are similar to the operations you can perform with cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 高级的函数允许您编写可以执行类似于您可以使用 cmdlet 执行的操作的操作的函数。

trans-unit.source: Advanced functions are helpful when you want to quickly write a function without having to write a compiled cmdlet using a Microsoft .NET Framework language.
trans-unit.target: 当您想要快速编写一个函数而无需编写使用 Microsoft.NET Framework 语言编译的 cmdlet 时，高级的函数是很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: These functions are also helpful when you want to restrict the functionality of a compiled cmdlet or when you want to write a function that is similar to a compiled cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 当想要的已编译的 cmdlet 限制的功能也想要编写一个函数，类似于编译 cmdlet 时，这些函数所也很有用。

trans-unit.source: There is a difference between authoring a compiled cmdlet and an advanced function.
trans-unit.target: 没有创作编译的 cmdlet 和一项高级的功能之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Compiled cmdlets are .NET Framework classes that must be written in a .NET Framework language such as C#.
trans-unit.target: 已编译的 cmdlet 是必须用.NET Framework 语言如 C# 编写的.NET Framework 类。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, advanced functions are written in the Windows PowerShell script language in the same way that other functions or script blocks are written.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，高级的函数是在 Windows PowerShell 脚本语言编写的相同的方式编写其他函数或脚本块。

trans-unit.source: Advanced functions use the CmdletBinding attribute to identify them as functions that act similar to cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 高级的函数使用 CmdletBinding 属性可将它们标识为函数的作用类似于 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The CmdletBinding attribute is similar to the Cmdlet attribute that is used in compiled cmdlet classes to identify the class as a cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: CmdletBinding 属性相当于在编译的 cmdlet 类中使用以将类标识为一个 cmdlet 的 Cmdlet 属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this attribute, see about_Functions_CmdletBindingAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 有关此属性的详细信息，请参阅 about_Functions_CmdletBindingAttribute。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a function that accepts a name and then prints a greeting using the supplied name.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示一个函数，接受名称，然后打印一条问候使用所提供的名称。

trans-unit.source: Also notice that this function defines a name that includes a verb (Send) and noun (Greeting) pair similar to the verb-noun pair of a compiled cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此外请注意，此函数定义包含一个谓词 （发送） 和名词 （问候） 对类似于编译 cmdlet 的动词-名词对的名称。

trans-unit.source: However, functions are not required to have a verb-noun name.
trans-unit.target: 但是，函数不需要具有动词-名词名称。

trans-unit.source: function Send-Greeting { [CmdletBinding()] Param( [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)] [string] $Name
trans-unit.target: 函数发送问候语 {[CmdletBinding()] Param ([Parameter(Mandatory=$true)] [string] $Name

trans-unit.source: Process { write-host ("Hello " + $Name + "!") } }
trans-unit.target: 进程 {的 write-host ("Hello"+ $Name +"！")}}

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the function are declared by using the Parameter attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用参数特性声明函数的参数。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used alone, or it can be combined with the Alias attribute or with several other parameter validation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以单独使用，或者可以将结合使用别名属性或者具有多个其他参数验证特性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to declare parameters (including dynamic parameters that are added at runtime), see about_Functions_Advanced_Parameters.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何声明参数 （包括在运行时添加的动态参数） 的详细信息，请参阅 about_Functions_Advanced_Parameters。

trans-unit.source: The actual work of the previous function is performed in the Process block, which is equivalent to the ProcessingRecord method that is used by compiled cmdlets to process the data that is passed to the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Previous 函数的实际工作中 Process 块，它相当于编译 cmdlet 用于处理的数据的传递给该 cmdlet 的 ProcessingRecord 方法执行。

trans-unit.source: This block, along with the Begin and End blocks, is described in the about_Functions_Advanced_Methods topic.
trans-unit.target: 此块中的，以及 Begin 和 End 块中，about_Functions_Advanced_Methods 主题所述。

trans-unit.source: Advanced functions differ from compiled cmdlets in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 高级的函数可与编译 cmdlet 不同，通过以下方式︰

trans-unit.source: Advanced function parameter binding does not throw an exception when an array of strings is bound to a Boolean parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组绑定到一个布尔型参数时，高级的函数参数绑定不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSet attribute and the ValidatePattern attribute cannot pass named parameters.
trans-unit.target: ValidateSet 属性和 ValidatePattern 属性不能将已命名的参数传递。

trans-unit.source: Advanced functions cannot be used in transactions.
trans-unit.target: 不能在事务中使用高级的功能。

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: about_Functions about_Functions_Advanced_Methods about_Functions_Advanced_Parameters about_Functions_CmdletBindingAttribute about_Functions_OutputTypeAttribute Windows PowerShell Cmdlets (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135279)
trans-unit.target: about_Functions about_Functions_Advanced_Methods about_Functions_Advanced_Parameters about_Functions_CmdletBindingAttribute about_Functions_OutputTypeAttribute Windows PowerShell Cmdlet (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135279)
